articles.title: Picture of President Kim Il Sung hung in Guinea
Portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Secy. Kim Jong Il hung in Nepal
articles.content:
Picture of President Kim Il Sung hung in Guinea
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A large picture of President Kim Il Sung meeting Guinean President Lansana Conte was hung in Guinea with due ceremony on the occasion of April 15, his birthday.
   The participants in the ceremony laid a floral basket and made a bow before the picture hanging at the building of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science.
   The director of the institute said:
   "We'll, cherishing deep in our mind the pride and honor of working at the institute with the august name of his excellency President Kim Il Sung, the great leader, invigorate our scientific research to carry out to the letter his behests and add lustre to the dignity and honor of the institute."
   President Kim Il Sung will always be with them and the friendship and solidarity between the peoples of Guinea and Korea will be everlasting, he stressed.

articles.title: Floral basket laid before Presidential Statue in Mongolia
articles.content:
Portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Secy. Kim Jong Il hung in Nepal
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of hanging the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Secretary Kim Jong Il was held in Nepal on April 12.
   The portraits were hung at the international forum office.
   The chairman of the forum said  their excellencies the great Kim Il Sung and Secretary Kim Jong Il are the outstanding leaders of the Korean and world revolution who have made great contributions to the happiness and prosperity of the Korean people and to the liberation and independence of the world's people.
   The hanging of the great leaders' portraits is an expression of the entire forum members and the Nepalese people's unbounded respect and reverence for them as well as a manifestation of the developing friendly relations between Nepal and Korea, he stressed.

articles.title: Overseas Korean artistes sing of national pride
articles.content:
Floral basket laid before Presidential Statue in Mongolia
  Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of laying a floral basket and bouquets before the Statue of President Kim Il Sung took place in Mongolia on April 12.
   The participants laid the basket and flowers and made a bow before the Statue of President Kim Il Sung at the Ten-Year Middle School in Altanbulag county, Tov Province.
   A letter to Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Review of Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Overseas Korean artistes sing of national pride
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Overseas Korean artistes highly praised the respected leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung as the great sun of the nation on the stage of the 15th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
   Following separate and group performances, art troupes of Koreans from Japan, China and the United States and an art troupe of the International United Confederation of Koreans gave a joint performance at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre from April 13.
   The Korean artistes from Japan in the song and dance "Bosom of the leader longed for even in dream" vividly showed the 700,000 Koreans in Japan running toward the Statue of the Generalissimo on Mansu Hill with floral baskets, praying for his immortality.
   A mixed chorus "Let us live with future" and "Answers of Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan)" they successfully depicted on a high artistic level the invariable pledge of Chongryon to remain loyal and devoted to Secretary Kim Jong Il forever, trusting and following only him without the slightest vacillation in any storm and stress.
   The narration and song "My motherland led by the General" put on stage by the Korean artistes from China showed the great national pride and confidence of Having Secretary Kim Jong Il as the great leader.
   Young dancers of the art troupe of the International United Confederation of Koreans put on stage dances "My motherland is very good" and "Korea is one" to be acclaimed by the spectators.
   The Korean artistes from the United States sang a mixed quartet "My country is best," clapping their hands together with the audience, and showed the pride of being members of the Korean nation which has the Generalissimo and the general as the eternal suns.

articles.title: Vice-Premier Jang Chol meets foreign artistes
articles.content:
Review of Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today frontpages a report that the Secretary Kim Jong Il extended thanks to those who published books conducive to the nation's scientific and technical development and the promotion of the people's health.
   Also frontpaged in the daily is a report that Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts from leaders and officials of an international organization, foreign parties and organizations on the occasion of the 85th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Printed in the daily are messages sent to Secretary Kim Jong Il from Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni and Lebanese President Elias Hrawi and gists of messages sent to him from foreign party leaders on the same occasion.
   The daily devotes large space to accounts of various local events held in commemoration of President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary including reports that people, servicemen and students laid floral baskets before his statues throughout the country and senior party and government officials saw joint performances of the 15th 
April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
   Under the banner headline "The respected President Kim Il Sung always remains alive in heart of all people" the daily gives accounts of grand commemoration of his birth anniversary in foreign countries.
   It is reported in the daily that monuments bearing teachings of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, an indomitable communist revolutionary fighter, were erected at the Mansudae Art Studio and the University of National Economy.
   The daily dedicates an article to the 15th anniversary of the publication of the famous work "The Life of a Revolutionary Should Begin With Struggle and End With Struggle" by President Kim Il Sung.
   It carries news of the production of coal and consumer goods, which has been increased around the April holiday.  It observes Syria's Independence Day.
   In an article the daily says Arab nations are meeting Israel's expansionist moves with strategy of unity.

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary commemorated by overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Vice-Premier Jang Chol meets foreign artistes 
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Jang Chol, Vice-Premier and Minister of Culture and Art, met and had a friendly talk with leading members and artistes of Russia's "Berioska" Dance Troupe, who have been participating in the 15th April Spring Friendship Art Festival, at the Pyongyang International House of Culture on Wednesday.
   He also met with leading members and artistes of the Mongolian Art Troupe.
   Present at the meeting was Mongolian Ambassador to Korea D. Byambaa.

articles.title: Banquet for commemorating birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung held in Cambodia
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary commemorated by overseas Koreans 
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kazakhstan and Korean residents' charitable organisations arranged a meeting, a film show and a photo exhibition on April 11 to commemorate the 85th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   The reporter and speakers at the meeting stressed the birth of President Kim Il Sung was the happiest event of the nation from which socialist Korea originated and a historic noteworthy event in the human history of the 20th century.
   They said the President was the greatest of great men and the great leader of people who had successfully built socialism.
   They stressed the Korean people are sure to win under the guidance of Secretary Kim Jong Il who is creditably carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the President.
   A message to Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Talks between NDFSK and Italian delegations
articles.content:
Banquet for commemorating birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung held in Cambodia 
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on April 12 on the occasion of the 85th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Large floral baskets sent by king of Cambodia Norodom Sihanouk and his wife, Chea Sim, President of National Assembly and Acting Head of State of Cambodia, and Norodom Ranariddh, First Prime Minister of Cambodia, were placed before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Secretary Kim Jong Il hanging on the front wall of the banquet hall.
   On display at the hall were pictures on the theme of "Father of People".
   Norodom Ranariddh, First Prime Minister and Chairman of the Funcinpec Party, said in his speech that the special friendly relations between the two countries are based on the special intimacy between the respected king Norodom Sihanouk and the great leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
   He expressed the belief that the respected leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is immortal in the hearts of the world people for his immortal exploits for the humankind.
   He wished the supreme leader of the Korean people Secrrretary Kim Jong Il, the great successor to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, a long life in good health to brilliantly accomplish the revolutionary cause pioneered by the Generalissimo.

articles.title: Senior Party, gov't officials enjoy joint art performances
articles.content:
Talks between NDFSK and Italian delegations 
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegations of the National Democratic Front of South Korea (NDFSK) led by Kim Kwang Min and the Movement for the Peace and Socialism of Italy led by Secretary General Roberto Gabriele, which have  come here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, were held at the NDFSK Pyongyang Mission on April 16. 
   At the talks the both sides informed each other of their activities and discussed the issue of further intensifying international support and solidarity between the two parties and a series of matters of common concern.

articles.title: Monumental work
articles.content:
Senior Party, gov't officials enjoy joint art performances 
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Senior party and government officials, including Vice-Presidents Ri Jong Ok, Pak Song Chol and Kim Pyong Sik, enjoyed joint art performances of the 15th April Spring Friendship Art Festival held at theatres in Pyongyang on April 14 and 16.
   The performances were also seen by overseas Koreans on a visit to the socialist homeland, foreign diplomatic representatives and embassy officials in Pyongyang and foreign visitors.
   The performances highly praised the enduring feats performed by President Kim Il Sung all his life for the freedom and happiness of the people and the cause of global independence.
   The performers showed the aspiration and noble mental world of the people to lead a happy and worthy life in an independent and peaceful new world free from war and subjugation.
   They loudly sang of the praise of the world's people for and their absolute trust in Secretary Kim Jong Il, who is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and sincerely wished him good health and longevity.

articles.title: Vice-President Ri Jong Ok meets Italian delegation
articles.content:
Monumental work 
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today dedicates a signed article headlined "undying work replete with noble revolutionary philosophy of greatest man" to the 15th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's famous work "The Life of a Revolutionary Should Begin With Struggle and End With Struggle".
   The work, which was published on April 15, 1982, represents the great life of the President dedicated to the people and carries the great revolutionary philosophy he regarded as his maxim in his protracted and glorious career.
   Expounded in the work are the ideas and theories -- a truth that only when one enjoys love and support from the people and fights in reliance upon the people, believing in their strength, can he emerge ever-victorious, a revolutionary outlook on life that the life of a revolutionary should begin with struggle and end with struggle, an idea that the revolution should be continued generation after generation and an idea that the rock-firm unity and cohesion of the revolutionary ranks should thoroughly be defended and steadily be strengthened.
   The great ideas and theories could be set forth only by the President, the peerless, great man, the article says, and continues:
   The work is a monumental one showing that he is a great man produced by heaven. It is also an undying revolutionary encyclopedia which is very instrumental in further tightening the bonds of kinship between the President and the Korean people with the victorious advance of the Juche revolutionary cause.
   The article lays special emphasis on the unity of all the people around Secretary Kim Jong Il based on the noble revolutionary obligation and unshakable faith, describing it as the true appearance of the unity and cohesion of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolutionary ranks clarified by the President in the work.

articles.title: Independence Day of Syrian people marked
articles.content:
Vice-President Ri Jong Ok meets Italian delegation
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Ri Jong Ok, politburo member of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and vice-president of the DPRK, met and had a friendly talk with the visiting delegation of the movement for peace and socialism of Italy led by general secretary Roberto Gabriele, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
   Present there was Vice Department Director of the WPK Central Committee Ji Jae Ryong.
   The head of the delegation said Korean socialism is dynamically advancing under the wise leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   The Pyongyang Declaration was an event of great significance in the socialist movement, he said, stressing the cause of socialism is sure to emerge victorious.

articles.title: Seminars on Juche idea held abroad
articles.content:
Independence Day of Syrian people marked
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today warmly congratulates the  Syrian people on the day of independence.
   Referring to the achievements of the Syrian people in their struggle to remove the aftermath of the colonial rule and build an independent and new society after the independence, a signed article of the paper says:
   The Syrian Arab Republic and people have made positive efforts to force the Israeli troops out of the Golan Heights on the peace-for-land principle and to solve the middle east problem in a fair and package way. This invites support from the international community.
   The Korean people are sincerely rejoiced over all the successes made by the Syrian people in their efforts to build a free, prosperous and new society.
   They are happy to have the Syrian people as a friend faithful to internationalist obligation.
    The Korean and Syrian people will always stand side by side in the struggle for independence.

articles.title: U.S. to donate food to DPRK
articles.content:
Seminars on Juche idea held abroad
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- National seminars on the Juche idea were recently held in Bangladesh, Mali and India in commemoration of the 85th birth anniversary of  President Kim Il Sung.
   It was noted at the seminars that President Kim Il Sung not only founded the immortal Juche idea but successfully applied it in Korea, proving the idea's great vitality in practice.
   It was also noted that the Juche idea has been developed and enriched by Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   Speakers at the seminars said that it is the greatest happiness and fortune for the Korean people and all other progressive people of the world to have Secretary Kim Jong Il as an outstanding leader of the human cause of independence.
   Letters to Secretary Kim Jong Il were adopted at the seminars.

articles.title: Gift to Secy. Kim Jong Il from Thai visitors
articles.content:
U.S. to donate food to DPRK
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. government on Tuesday decided to supply 50,000 tons of food worth about d15 million to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in response to an appeal of the world food programme.
   Earlier, on Feb. 19, it decided to offer d10 million worth food to the DPRK through the WFP.
   The decisions are humanitarian steps taken with regard to the DPRK's food problem following two years of floods.
